Project Quantum

 Wits University

*Click on the image above to view project pictures*


Completed Project Details:


- Upgrade old network infrastructure and provided WIFI across all campuses of WITS (central and remote),

- Project duration: 18 months (on and off),

- Spliced Data Centre patch panels +- 20,

- Spliced Mini Distribution patch panels +- 150,

- OTDR trace results +- 10000,

- Combination of OM2, OM3, OM4, Single Mode and Multimode splicing +- 10000,

- Installed Cabinets floor and wall mounted, internal and external Access Points, built cable routes, removed old equipment and migrations from old to new equipment while keeping the campus wifi on with minimal downtime.
